function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Varying measurement units and missing standard deviations may lead to inaccurate data analysis and conclusions.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited evidence for the effectiveness of barrier devices like n95 masks over simple surgical masks.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Confounding additional routines may affect the interpretation of the effectiveness of interventions such as adding virucidals or antiseptics to normal handwashing.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for confounding in studies evaluating reduced transmission of respiratory viruses","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate blinding or adjustment for confounders in study design","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inappropriate interventions and comparison causing problems with study designs","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Compliance issues with interventions, especially educational programmes","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confusion between cohort design and before-and-after design, leading to unsupported conclusions.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate randomisation in randomised studies leading to biased results.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of potential confounders in non-randomised studies affecting the accuracy of results.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent data extraction and aggregation leading to unreliable pooled estimates.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exclusion of vaccines and antivirals from the study","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No language restrictions applied to study search","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of outdated search databases up to november 2006","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of single measures such as vaccines or antivirals in interrupting the spread of influenza","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability of urban big data to capture underlying cause-effect relationships","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on complex multidimensional mobility index data","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid development of data resource without comprehensive planning","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Open collaboration between research institutions and public authorities may lead to unfiltered or unverified data being used in decision-making processes.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proactive agile development of the covid-19 dashboard without proper planning may result in incomplete or inaccurate data representation.","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in air pollution and improvement in environmental indices such as nitrogen dioxide.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data integration for specific covid-19 impacts","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid development of dashboard","category":"Data in/out","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Observing social change without clear action plan","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 crisis management using iot and smart city data","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Short-term cash flow issues due to economic lockdown and reduced business activities.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the business return plan due to evolving covid-19 situation and economic consequences.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to cultural change","category":"Culture/Diversity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential delay of infrastructure projects","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited generalizability of research results","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of communication and employee well-being considerations","category":"Education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on infrastructure projects and staff members","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty conducting drugs and alcohol tests for new staff","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential economic collapse","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited work from home periods for employees during lockdown","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for unexpected outbreaks such as covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in adjusting commercial terms and place of work requirements to comply with safety obligations","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced workforce on site may impact the ability to deliver projects as promised, leading to potential delays and client dissatisfaction.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of technology and mobile phones for remote work","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hiring new staff members during a pandemic without in-person interviews and induction process.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital tools and remote work may lead to decreased attention to health and safety protocols on site, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital modeling and visualization tools may lead to decreased physical collaboration, potentially hindering effective problem-solving and communication","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delays in project completion due to lockdown and high-risk personnel","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Communication challenges between off-site manager and on-site team","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on digital tools for construction coordination","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Site engineers and surveyors forced to work from home due to covid-19 lockdown rules","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in providing required services due to high-risk personnel unable to conduct on-site work","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High-risk personnel unwilling to risk their health to conduct critical surveying tasks on-site","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in managing project teams due to remote work","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to conduct site investigations and health inspections","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
